casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the GUARDIANSHIP OF the Person and Estate of Jean Ruth ECHEVARRIA, a Protected Person. Michael A. Echevarria, Appellant,
v.
Robert L. Ansara, Guardian of the Estate and Successor Trustee of the Protected Person's Living Trust, Respondent. No. 76253 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MAY 15, 2019

AFFIRMED.
